front.title: DTLS Encapsulation of SCTP Packets for RTCWEB

abstract.t: The Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) is a transport protocol originally defined to run on top of the network protocols IPv4 or IPv6. This memo document specifies how SCTP can be used on top of the Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) protocol. SCTP over DTLS is used by the RTCWeb protocol suite for transporting non- media data between browsers.
